metadata.title: Reject Weapons Pack
metadata.author: Chrono Vortex additional credit: R4V3-0N, Felipe, TaxiService
metadata.description: Home of lost animation sheets, forgotten sprites and concepts which never made it off the drawing board. This pack adds several unique weapons which were originally meant to be included in other mods, and were cool enough that I just couldn't let them die. It also includes some content from TaxiService's Mod Testing Environment, an artifact from a time when the Hyperspace console wasn't even a thought.
